entities.name: snatcher
entities.description: A person who is not in sight, mentioned as being out-of-sight.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a witch with prodigious skill and no conscience.

entities.name: scabior
entities.description: A person who drew his wand in anger.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A witch who is bearing down upon the werewolf with a sword.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: A werewolf who was forced into a kneeling position.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: A house at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, mentioned as the owner of the sword.

relationships.description: Bellatrix is bearing down upon Greyback with a sword.
Bellatrix has the sword of Gryffindor in her hand.
Greyback is being attacked by Bellatrix with a sword.
Scabior drew his wand in anger when Harry was defending himself.
